title: How to Make Spaghetti Casserole

steps.headline: Go grocery shopping for the following items: 2 eggs, 2 tablespoon (29.6 ml).
steps.description: butter, 1 pound ground beef,  1 jar of pasta sauce, 1 cup cottage cheese, 1/3 Parmesan cheese, 1 tsp. sugar, 2 cups mozzarella cheese, 1/2 box thin spaghetti.

steps.headline: Boil water in a 2 US-quart (2,000 ml) saucepan.
steps.description: Add pasta when water is at a boil, and cook for 10-11 minutes.

steps.headline: Brown meat while pasta is cooking.
Melt butter.
steps.description: In a small bowl, mix together the melted butter, eggs, and Parmesan cheese. Set aside.

steps.headline: When pasta is done cooking, drain.
steps.description: Stir the mixture in Step 5 together with the pasta.

steps.headline: Drain grease from browned meat.
steps.description: Add jar of pasta sauce and 1 tsp. sugar. Mix together thoroughly.

steps.headline: In a 9x13 baking dish, mix together the pasta and meat.
steps.description: Spread evenly throughout. Spoon 1 cup of cottage cheese over the top.

steps.headline: After 20 minutes, sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top and continue baking for 5 more minutes or until cheese melts.

text: Go grocery shopping for the following items: 2 eggs, 2 tablespoon (29.6 ml). butter, 1 pound ground beef,  1 jar of pasta sauce, 1 cup cottage cheese, 1/3 Parmesan cheese, 1 tsp. sugar, 2 cups mozzarella cheese, 1/2 box thin spaghetti. Preheat oven to 350.  Boil water in a 2 US-quart (2,000 ml) saucepan. Add pasta when water is at a boil, and cook for 10-11 minutes. Brown meat while pasta is cooking.  Melt butter. In a small bowl, mix together the melted butter, eggs, and Parmesan cheese. Set aside. When pasta is done cooking, drain. Stir the mixture in Step 5 together with the pasta. Drain grease from browned meat. Add jar of pasta sauce and 1 tsp. sugar. Mix together thoroughly. In a 9x13 baking dish, mix together the pasta and meat. Spread evenly throughout. Spoon 1 cup of cottage cheese over the top. Bake for 20 minutes.  After 20 minutes, sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top and continue baking for 5 more minutes or until cheese melts.  Enjoy!
